title: Pvt capex to pick up, Rs 4 lakh cr credit demand pipeline from India Inc: SBI Chairman
description: SBI Chairman C S Setty revealed that the bank has a Rs 4 lakh crore credit pipeline from India Inc, with private sector capital expenditure expected to rise in the fiscal year's second half. Government capital expenditure is also set to increase, with a target of Rs 11.11 lakh crore for 2024-25.
